title: Men & Women Praying Side By Side with a Partition between them? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: Umm Amina from the Emirates Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuh I don't understand your question Umm Amina. Are you referring to praying in congregation in the masjid? Yes, but the women's side is side by side. And the women are side by side to the men? Correct. And they have a partition between them? There's a partition between us, but the men's side is to the left of the women's side.
